mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(title, submessage, price, volume, image, description, origprice, count, description_image, freight_money, sales, invalid) VALUES (#{title}, #{submessage}, #{price}, #{volume}, #{image}, #{description}, #{origprice}, #{count}, #{description_image}, #{freight_money}, #{sales}, #{invalid})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET title = #{title}, submessage = #{submessage}, price = #{price}, volume = #{volume}, description = #{description}, origprice = #{origprice}, count = #{count}, freight_money = #{freight_money}, sales = #{sales}, image = #{image}, description_image = #{description_image}, invalid = #{invalid} WHERE id = #{id}
